summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City's Community Development Block Grant Program for the Grant Program Year, January 1, 1986 through December 31, 1986, amending Ordinance 112677 to add a new Section 3A, creating interim use projects by the Department of Community Development through the making of loans and authorizing the Department of Community Development to enter into agreements necessary to effect the projects; and appropriating funds from the Housing Community Development Revenue Sharing Fund.
